pages.title: Elemental Scrolls
pages.text: Elemental Scrolls are magical items used to unleash elemental powers. Each scroll grants a unique active ability when right-clicked and a passive effect when held in the off-hand during combat.$(br)These scrolls are created by transmuting Parchments in the $(l:hexalia:rituals/ritual_of_transmutation)Ritual of Transmutation$().

pages.title: Fire Scroll
pages.text: $(br)$(bold)Right-click:$() Launches a fireball. $(br2)$(italic)Cooldown: $(#ff0000)15 seconds$(br)$(italic)Off-hand bonus:$() Gain Fire Resistance for 2s on hit.$(br)$(#ff0000)Cannot be used when it's raining or underwater.

pages.title: Air Scroll
pages.text: $(br)$(bold)Right-click:$() Grants temporary flight. $(br2)$(italic)Cooldown: $(#9d9d9d)60 seconds$(br)$(italic)Off-hand bonus:$() Step backwards and apply Levitation to target on hit.$(br)$(#9d9d9d)Cannot be used during a thunderstorm.

pages.title: Water Scroll
pages.text: $(br)$(bold)Right-click:$() Unleash a tidal surge pushing mobs. $(br2)$(italic)Cooldown: $(#335b8a)25 seconds$(br)$(italic)Off-hand bonus:$() Gain Dolphins Grace and Conduit Power for 2s on hit.$(br)$(#335b8a)Can only be used in water.

pages.title: Earth Scroll
pages.text: $(br)$(bold)Right-click:$() Release a shockwave stunning mobs for 5s. $(br2)$(italic)Cooldown: $(#ae7838)40 seconds$(br)$(italic)Off-hand bonus:$() Gain Spikeskin for 2s on hit.$(br)$(#8b4513)Cannot be used underwater.
